706676f-a.title: Brooklyn: Scholes Street - Graham Avenue
706676f-a.text:
165-173 Scholes Street, north side, east from Graham Ave. Also seeu is 202-204 Graham Ave., east side, at the N.E. corner of Scholes Street.
In the foreground, is the Graham Ave., Trolley Line.
October 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
706676f-a.folder: Scholes Street & Graham Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

706675f-a.title: Brooklyn: Scholes Street - Graham Avenue
706675f-a.text:
Scholes Street, at the N.W. corner of Graham Ave. Also shown, is Nos. 202-204 Grahaw Ave., (right), at the N.E. corner of Scholes Street.
September 27, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
706675f-a.folder: Scholes Street & Graham Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

706674f-a.title: Brooklyn: Scholes Street - Graham Avenue
706674f-a.text:
Scholes Street, south side, between Graham and Manhattan Aves., as seen across the clearing at the N.Wi. corner of Graham Ave., and Scholes Street. In the background (left), are the Spires of the Most Holy Trinity Church
(R.C.).
March 31, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
706674f-a.folder: Scholes Street & Graham Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

704667f-a.title: Brooklyn: Graham Avenue - Scholes Street
704667f-a.text:
Graham Ave., east side, south from Scholes Street. Also seen is Scholes Street, south side, east of Graham Ave. The women in costume,
crossing the street, are gypsies.
October 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
704667f-a.folder: Graham Avenue & Scholes Street, Brooklyn, NY

704668f-a.title: Brooklyn: Graham Avenue - Scholes Street
704668f-a.text:
195-209 Graham Avv:., west side, north from Scholes Street. Also seen is 149 Scholes Street, east side, In the foreground, is the Graham
Ave., trolley line.
October 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
704668f-a.folder: Graham Avenue & Scholes Street, Brooklyn, NY

704669f-b.title: Brooklyn: Graham Avenue - Scholes Street
704669f-b.text:
(1)
Grahaa Ave., west side, north of Scholes Street,facross clearing at the N.W. corner; showing a new Public School, on the south west of
Stagg Street and Graham Ave.
August 10, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
Pebruary 1, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
704669f-b.folder: Graham Avenue & Scholes Street, Brooklyn, NY

706677f-a.title: Brooklyn: Scholes Street - Graham Avenue
706677f-a.text:
169 Scholes Street, north side, near Graham Ave.
October 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
